articles.title: US CDC cuts COVID-19 quarantine time - BusinessWorld Online
articles.description: US HEALTH authorities on Monday shortened the recommended isolation time for Americans with asymptomatic cases of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) to five days from the previous guidance of 10 days.

articles.description:
